name: AWS Marketplace Metering Service
description: AWS Marketplace provides a new sales channel for ISVs and Consulting Partners to sell their solutions to AWS customers. We make it easy for customers to find, buy, deploy and manage software solutions, including SaaS, in a matter of minutes. AWS Marketplace sellers can use this API to submit usage data for custom usage dimensions.
